scripts.specFeature: node -e "process.platform === 'win32' ? (console.log('Running on Windows') || require('child_process').execSync('npx cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/features/%npm_config_feature%.feature', { stdio: 'inherit' })) : (console.log('Running on Unix-like OS') || require('child_process').execSync('npx cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/features/$npm_config_features.feature', { stdio: 'inherit' }))"
scripts.recordSpecFeature: node -e "process.platform === 'win32' ? (console.log('Running on Windows') || require('child_process').execSync('npx cypress run --record --spec cypress/e2e/features/%npm_config_feature%.feature', { stdio: 'inherit' })) : (console.log('Running on Unix-like OS') || require('child_process').execSync('npx cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/features/$npm_config_features.feature', { stdio: 'inherit' }))"
scripts.specTag: node -e "process.platform === 'win32' ? (console.log('Running on Windows') || require('child_process').execSync('npx cypress run --env TAGS="%npm_config_tag%"', { stdio: 'inherit' })) : (console.log('Running on Unix-like OS') || require('child_process').execSync('npx cypress run --spec npx cypress run --env TAGS="$npm_config_tags"', { stdio: 'inherit' }))"
scripts.recordSpecTag: node -e "process.platform === 'win32' ? (console.log('Running on Windows') || require('child_process').execSync('npx cypress run --record --env TAGS="%npm_config_tag%"', { stdio: 'inherit' })) : (console.log('Running on Unix-like OS') || require('child_process').execSync('npx cypress run --spec npx cypress run --env TAGS="$npm_config_tags"', { stdio: 'inherit' }))"
